question: Please choose as many applicable regions as possible.
clarification: This variable documents the region or regions that is/are the targets of a particular government policy.

question: Please write in what cities/municipalities this policy is targeted towards.
clarification: This variable documents the city that is/are the target of a particular government policy, if applicable. Note, it only takes on a value if [target geog level] == "One or more cities within one or more countries".

question: Please write in what other geographic or administrative unit this policy is targeted towards.
clarification: This variable documents the subnational region or regions that is/are the target of a particular government policy which are not provinces or cities. Note, it only takes on a value if [target geog level] == ‘One or more geographical or administrative units (other than provincial or city level units) within one or more countries”

question: Please select from the list below what or whom the policy is targeted at.
clarification: This variable codes the people or materials who are the target of a particular policy.

options.note: Government policy that applies to all humans regardless of residency or travel status.
Government policy targeted toward all travelers, both foreign and domestic.
A government policy that applies only to domestic nationals travelling outside the country initiating the policy.
A government policy that applies to only to foreign nationals travelling outside the country initiating the policy.
Government policy targeted toward residents, both foreign nationals and domestic nationals, in the country initiating the policy.
Government policies that apply only to citizens who are residing in the country initiating the policy.
Government policies that that apply only to foreign nationals who are residing in the country in initiating the policy.
Government policies that that apply only to foreign nationals who are residing in the country in initiating the policy.
Individuals with citizenship or permanent residency in the country initiating the policy.
Government policy targeted toward human health staff.
Government policy targeted toward health related supplies.
